tablesaw.rules
Interface Rule

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPatternRule, AbstractRule, AbstractSimpleRule, AbstractSourceRule, AntBuildRule, CleanRule, CopyRule, CRule, CSharpProgram, DefinitionsRule, DirectoryRule, GZipRule, HelpRule, JarFile, JarRule, JavaCompiler, JavaCRule, JavaProgram, JUnitRule, PatternRule, PomRule, PublishRule, RequiredPropertyRule, ResolveRule, RetrieveRule, SimpleRule, TarRule, WarRule, ZipRule
public interface Rule
extends java.lang.Cloneable

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of the rule or null if the rule is anonymous.

setName

Rule setName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name of this rule. The name can be passed to other rules' addDepend method or specified on the command line to run this rule.

Parameters:
name - Name of the rule.

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns a description of this rule - used for displaying help and generating ant build file.

isBinding

boolean isBinding()
Determins if rules that depend on this rule should be ran if this one runs.

Returns:
true if dependent rule should run if this rule runs (default)

getOverride

boolean getOverride()
This identifies if this rule can be overridden by other rules in the build script

getMakeAction

MakeAction getMakeAction()
Returns the make action for this rule.

getDependRules

java.lang.Iterable<Rule> getDependRules()
Gets the immediate depends of this rule

getDependNames

java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> getDependNames()
Gets the immediate depends of this rule. Each name in the returned list is first treated as a named rule, if that lookup fails it is treated as the name of an actual file.

getTargets

java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> getTargets()
Returns a list of targets this rule will create

needToRun

boolean needToRun()
                  throws TablesawException
the rule will check to see if it needs to run or not This will only be called if none of the depends cause this rule to run

Throws:
TablesawException

preBuild

void preBuild(DependencyCache cache,
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> modificationCache)
              throws TablesawException
Called when the build engine is considering this rule to be added to the build queue. This is called before needToRun This is a good place for the rule to parse source and or target files to include any additional depends that it may have

Throws:
TablesawException

inBuildQueue

void inBuildQueue()
                  throws TablesawException
This is to notify the rule that the rule has been placed in the build queue for a rebuild. This gives the rule the oportunity to delete any target files before rebuilding, this ensures a complete build.

Throws:
TablesawException

buildComplete

void buildComplete()
Called if the build for this rule completes successfully. It allows the rule to save information to the build cache.

verify

void verify()
            throws TablesawException
Called after the build so the rule can verify the results

Throws:
TablesawException

clone

java.lang.Object clone()
                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
Clone the rule

Throws:
java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
